usage: Aerobic classes, strength training, HIIT workouts, full body workouts, floor-based circuits like dumbbell push-ups
key_features: Free of phthalate, lead and odor
ai_description: A pair of vibrant pink hexagonal dumbbells with a matte neoprene coating. Each dumbbell has '1.5KG' printed in white on one end. The hexagonal shape provides stability and prevents rolling. The infographic and lifestyle images show the dumbbells being used in various exercises, highlighting the comfortable non-slip grip and ergonomic design. The product is shown both in studio shots on a white background and in use during gym workouts.
target_audience: Men and women of all ages, beginners and experienced users
manual: Manufactured using REACH-compliant, non-toxic materials, these dumbbells feature an odor-free, color-stable coating that resists fading and wear over time. The carbon-free composition ensures a cleaner, safer finish, while the surface texture remains consistent and comfortable even under extreme hot or cold temperature conditions. Designed with a precision hex shape, the dumbbells offer enhanced ground stability and prevent rolling during floor-based exercises, making them safe, durable, and reliable for everyday training.
